author: jinfwhuang
content:
I agree with many of the points that Alex raised about a light client supporting "attestations". As of now, there is definitely not enough details to define a feasible version. The classification by "functionality" is a method to think about light weight clients. Classifying light client in terms of what they could do forces us to be specific about what we mean by a light client.

I responded to Alex's discussions on "light validator" on the ethresear.ch thread. I argued that there could be value in breaking that "uniformity" ideal.
